Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimizing a linear objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimizing an objective function with integer variables

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Breaking down complex problems into smaller subproblems

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimizing a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Optimizing a linear objective function with integer and continuous variables

Name: Mixed-Integer Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimizing a nonlinear objective function with integer and continuous variables

Name: Semi-Definite Programming
Description: Optimizing a linear objective function subject to semi-definite constraints

Name: Robust Optimization
Description: Optimizing under uncertainty with guaranteed performance
Example: Supply chain optimization with uncertain demand

Name: Bi-Level Programming
Description: Optimizing a problem with nested optimization problems

Name: Global Optimization
Description: Finding the global optimum of a non-convex problem
